attributes.action: Provide a response to all petitions of 5000 signatures or more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drinking outside in the area of Soho has resulted in Westminster responding to the issue with only 7000+ signatures at the time of this post.
Is this the best our government can do? To answer a simple (albeit important to some) topic of drinking in the street?
What about the real issues petitioned on this web-site?
When a petition reaches 5000 signatures there should be a response in relation to that petition, regardless of how simple or difficult it may be to answer.

rejection.details:
Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.  

However, as stated in the Terms and Conditions, we endeavour to provide an answer to all e-petitions that make a serious point and receive at least 200 signatures after they close.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
